title: bert1587
author: bert1587
content: I'm selling my personal Stake.com Plat3 account.  Benefits of this account include:Weekly bonus: Minimum of $10 with minimal play (under 1k coin in)Monthly bonus: Minimum of $75 with minimal play, I personally have never gotten under $90 except for months where I literally gambled only weekly bonus amountsPre and post monthly: $30 each, seems to be no minimum play qualificationI'm asking for $500   You can easily recoup this in three months with very minimal play (just leave one or two weeklies on the account to spin with).  If you are an active player you'd recoup this in under two months, and freeroll the lifetime of the account.
